## Quality Checklist

Please review and check off the items below before requesting review:

### Core Quality (All PRs)
- [ ] The PR solves the problem it claims to solve
- [ ] Code follows project conventions and style guidelines
- [ ] New code has appropriate tests (not just passing, but meaningful coverage)
- [ ] All errors are properly handled (no `.unwrap()` in production code)
- [ ] Public APIs have doc comments (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if user-facing changes)

### Label-Based Requirements

**Add appropriate labels to this PR** (bug, enhancement, security, etc.)

When you add labels, an automated comment will appear with additional checklist items specific to that label type. Complete those items as well.
